verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> I will praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵבָ֑ב <S%H3824><s%> with [my] whole heart בְּס֖וֹד <S%H5475><s%> in the assembly יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> of the upright וְעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> and [in] the congregation

גְּ֭דֹלִים <S%H1419><s%> [are] great מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> The works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <S%H1875><s%> sought out לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2656><s%> of all them that have pleasure

הוֹד־ <S%H1935><s%> [is] honourable וְהָדָ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> and glorious פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <S%H6467><s%> His work וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> to be remembered עָ֭שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> He hath made לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <S%H6381><s%> his wonderful works חַנּ֖וּן <S%H2587><s%> [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> and full of compassion יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

טֶ֭רֶף <S%H2964><s%> meat נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He hath given לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> unto them that fear יִזְכֹּ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> be mindful לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> him he will ever בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> of his covenant

כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> the power מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <S%H4639><s%> of his works הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> He hath shewed לְעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> that he may give לָ֝הֶ֗ם נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> them the heritage גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen

מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> The works יָ֭דָיו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> [are] verity וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <S%H539><s%> [are] sure כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <S%H6490><s%> all his commandments

סְמוּכִ֣ים <S%H5564><s%> They stand fast לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and ever עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <S%H6213><s%> [and are] done בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> in truth וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <S%H3477><s%> and uprightness

פְּד֤וּת ׀ <S%H6304><s%> redemption שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent לְעַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people צִוָּֽה־ <S%H6680><s%> he hath commanded לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> holy וְנוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> and reverend שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name

רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> [is] the beginning חָכְמָ֨ה ׀ <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom יִרְאַ֬ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> understanding ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> a good לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> have all עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> have all they that do תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8416><s%> [his commandments] his praise עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever
